message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for you. I'm offering it for $150.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $150 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay.  I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $100 right now.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to come down to $125, but that's my absolute lowest. Let me know if you're interested.
Alice, thanks for coming down.  I'm still interested, but $125 is still a bit high.  I'm willing to go up to $110.  Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
